long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mi-House is an online radio station that specialises in House and Dance music. Launched November 5, 2018, it is part of the Mi-Soul group, the team who took Kiss FM from pirate to Plc.  Mi-House is a music platform, broadcasting online across the world through its website mi-houseradio.com and mobile phone apps.
